.person .icons svg { width: 16px; height: 16px; display: block; }

.person .tags { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: .35rem; margin-top: .25rem; }
.person .tag {
  font-size: .8rem; padding: .15rem .45rem; border-radius: 999px;
  background: #f2f2f2;
}
